review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: :laughing: I had exactly the same thoughts, in this order... but then I realized that it is not a simple elimination, because the pairwise coprimality hypothesis is used to derive coprimality with partial products, and simple inductions do not take into account partial big operators. So maybe there is a higher order induction scheme for this, but I did not figure it out, and went for an induction on the sequence instead.
